name: Loud Cloud Jormungandr, Great Serpen
text:
2 Reptile monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: Special Summon 1 of the Link Materials used for the Link Summon of this card to a zone this card points to. You can banish this face-up card you control: Special Summon 1 "Loud Cloud" monster from your Deck or GY, ignoring Summoning Conditions. You can only use each effect of "Loud Cloud Jormungandr" once per turn.
